title: The Vegan Joint
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Organic, Thai, Fast food, Juice bar, Delivery, Take-out, Catering
description: A casual neighborhood cafe. Its vegan menu featuring breakfast items like burritos and pancake, plus extensive lunch and dinner including wraps, veggie burgers, pineapple curry, fried rice, pad Thai noodle, and main dishes with brown rice and featuring tofu, veggies, and mockmeats. Soy products used are vegan, and seitan is made in-house. Parking on street.
